The Element of Kindness.power: Fluttershy deals a target X energy damage, where X = the number of Elements in play.

Bear call.power: A Pet regains 2 HP and deals a target 2 melee damage. That Pet may then deal each other non-hero target 2 melee damage. If it does, destroy this card.

The Stare.start of turn: At the start of your turn, destroy this card.
The Stare.text: Pets and non-hero non-character targets have no end of turn effects. You cannot use powers.

Pony-Pet Playdate.text: The first time any Pet enters play each turn, it regains 1 HP.
Pony-Pet Playdate.power: Play up to three Pets. Each regains 1 HP. If more than one Pet entered play this way, destroy this card.

Everfree Cottage.text: Reduce environment damage dealt to Pets by 2.

modifiers.text: -2 Damage dealt to pets by environment

Rabbit Roundup.text: When one of your Pets would be destroyed, you may prevent that destruction and restore that Pet to 3 HP, then destroy this card.
Rabbit Roundup.on entry: When this card enters play, a target regains 2 HP.

How Dare You!.start of turn: At the start of your turn, destroy all other copies of this card.
How Dare You!.text: When a Pet is destroyed by a villain card, a villain target deals itself 2 psychic damage.
How Dare You!.on entry: When this card enters play, you may play a Pet from your hand or trash.

Find a Pet.text: Each player either draws a card or reveals cards from the top of their deck until a target is revealed, puts it in their hand, and shuffles the other cards into their deck. Collect a Pet, salvage a Pet or play a card. If you play a Pet this way, it regains 2 HP.

A Lovely Picnic.text: Five targets not at full HP regain 2 HP each. When a non-hero target regains HP this way, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your turn.
